Name: The List
Description: Allows you to block other users via adding them to the list. Blocked users names show red in lobby and cannot friend request you. Additionally allows you to disable friend requests.

Name: Favorite n Random Cosmetics
Description: Allows for the easy randomization of only certain cosmetics through the favorite system, just right-click them in the Personalize page. Also allowing to only randomize the categories you want.

Name: Colour Swapper
Description: Allows you to change the color of every faction in the game

Name: Day Events Messages
Description: Adds a message to chat when a day killing occurs.

Name: Text Editor
Description: Allows you to dump, edit and load the game's strings easily. Any stringtables placed into the "Custom" folder will be loaded instead of the game's version.

Name: Match Replays
Description: Records replays of your games that can be rewatched live in-game. Control your replays with features such as speeding up in-game time, revealing all roles and pausing the replay.

Name: The Soundpack Mod
Description: This mod allows for the customization of all music and sounds of the game. Join <color=blue>https://discord.gg/ht8ttc3R8E</color> for a explanation on how soundpacks work.

Name: Roledecks
Description: Create and save roledecks in Custom, allowing you to instantly load your favourite lists!

Name: Sky Controller
Description: Allows you to customize the sky on all your maps, with bonus settings such as syncing to realtime

Name: Fancy Chat
Description: Adds Fancy Chat to the game

Name: Colored Nametags
Description: Adds further customization to your nametags in-game.

Name: Town Traitor Mode
Description: Adds Town Traitor gamemode queue to the game.

Name: Game Logs
Description: Generates game logs after each game you played and saves them to your game directory.

Name: Last Will Presets
Description: Allows you to preset your last will for games. You can use %role% to put your role tagged as #role, %randomrole% to give you a random Town role, %name% to put your name tagged as @name, %subalign% to put your alignment , %ti% %tk% %tp% %ts% %tpow% %rt% %ne% %na% %nk% %cpow% %ck% %cu% %cd% for alignments.

Name: Auto GG
Description: For when being a good sport is too hard.

Name: Movable Wills
Description: Drag the top part of your will/notes/death note to move them!

Name: Discord Rich Presence
Description: Adds Discord Rich Presence to the game. Does NOT work on Mac for now.

Name: Auto Accept Ranked Queue
Description: Automatically accepts the ranked queue confirmation message when enabled.

Name: Improbable Death Animations
Description: Death animations will occur more rarely, which will make you appreciate them more!

Name: Pseudonyms
Description: Randomize your in-game name! Find the appropriate files in ModFolders. Delete files to reset names.

Name: Better Mentions
Description: Enhancements and customizations to the of mentions of the game and their recognition.

Name: Icon Packs
Description: The mod adds a bit of flair to icons! Credits to MysticMismagius and Nidoskull for the artwork and Pat for coding help!

Name: Chat Emojis
Description: Express yourself with emojis! Emojis will be added to the keyword mention system, start by typing ':'.
